input.sentences: i had a great time on my vacation last weekend .
there were a lot of cool places there .
all the buildings were very old .
i had a lot of respect for them .
output.sentences: This past weekend I took time for a vacation.
I saw a lot of cool things.
I saw amazing architecture and beautiful buildings.
The buildings were amazing to behold.
I have a lot of respect for the persons who built and designed them.
